title: Give us shit since you cucked the TFT rewards
body: You guys somehow broke the menu and now i cant get my emote, so if yo want to slide us some shit that would be cool

replies.body: No, The first part of the pass ended on the 29th. The second part will begin in patch 9.16 so you had plenty of notice as it was posted in an announcement when it would end.

> [{quoted}](name=WrongBrother,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=8gK4cURo,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-08-04T17:02:49.735+0000)
>
> You guys somehow broke the menu and now i cant get my emote, so if yo want to slide us some shit that would be cool

This is your typical league fan.  Were not all like this but most are. 
Entitled: check
Condescending: Check (Me too!) 
Thinks they know better: check
Offers a solution based in selfishness rather than actual improvement: Check
Stinks like fine cheese: Pending, but likely.
Sounds like someone voted for Bernie...

Lol as if there's a candidate that is worth voting for.  The system is a ruin and it won't fix itself internally.  Waiting for it to finally break is the status quo, though.  So the people are still complacent.  Which is why there's a Trump in office and not a Martin Luther King or Einstein or any paragon of humanity.  Failing to demand the best from our leadership and system of governance is why things are getting so close to a breaking point.  It's how every revolution in human history has begun.

> [{quoted}](name=Famorii,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=8gK4cURo,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-08-05T03:23:07.801+0000)
>
> Lol as if there's a candidate that is worth voting for.  The system is a ruin and it won't fix itself internally.  Waiting for it to finally break is the status quo, though.  So the people are still complacent.  Which is why there's a Trump in office and not a Martin Luther King or Einstein or any paragon of humanity.  Failing to demand the best from our leadership and system of governance is why things are getting so close to a breaking point.  It's how every revolution in human history has begun.

I wasn't here to start a giant political argument, just make a link between this guy's outlook and Bernie's platform of "you deserve free stuff".
